name: Reflection Run
description:
WebGL needs to be fullscreen!!!!!

A competitive 2-player platformer/racing game. This game is multiplayer so sadly you will require either a friend or really good luck stealing somebody else's friend...

or possibly a hostage.

Keybinds:

A/D for left and right movement, space for jumping.

ESC to show the cursor.

You will be joined into a game as soon as another player starts the game, there will be a noise indicator so it is safe to use other windows.
